name: Sales
description: Explore our exclusive sales collection featuring unbeatable discounts on a wide range of apparel and accessories. From trendy hoodies to classic t-shirts, find your perfect style at a fraction of the price. Don't miss out on these limited-time offers to upgrade your wardrobe without breaking the bank!

name: Hoodies
description: Discover our cozy and stylish hoodies collection, perfect for staying warm and fashionable. Whether you're looking for a casual everyday hoodie or something with a bit more flair, our selection has something for everyone. Made from high-quality materials, these hoodies offer comfort and durability for all your adventures.

name: T-Shirts
description: Browse our versatile t-shirts collection, featuring a variety of styles, colors, and designs to suit every taste. From classic basics to graphic tees, our t-shirts are made from soft, breathable fabrics that ensure all-day comfort. Perfect for layering or wearing on their own, these t-shirts are a wardrobe essential.

name: Accessories
description: Enhance your look with our curated accessories collection, offering a range of stylish and functional items. From durable notebooks to insulated travel mugs, our accessories are designed to complement your lifestyle. Perfect for students and professionals alike, these essentials add a touch of convenience and flair to your daily routine.

name: promotional
description: Check out our promotional collection featuring exclusive items designed to showcase your university pride. From branded apparel to unique accessories, these products are perfect for students, alumni, and supporters looking to represent their institution in style. Don't miss the chance to grab these limited-edition pieces that celebrate your connection to the university community.
